author: James Van Straten
title: Michael Saylor's Strategy Added 4,980 Bitcoin Last Week, Bringing Stack to 597,325 Coins
description: The fresh acquisition was funded mostly through sales of common stock with sales of preferred shares accounting for a modest proportion.
content: James Van Straten is a Senior Analyst at CoinDesk, specializing in Bitcoin and its interplay with the macroeconomic environment. Previously, James worked as a Research Analyst at Saidler & Co., a… [+406 chars]
